trend_summary: Across the image sequence the area stays sparsely settled. Built-up footprints edge outward only slightly near existing hamlets; no new towns emerge. Several cultivated parcels transition to forest, boosting continuous canopy cover. Remaining farmland consolidates into larger fields. The road network is largely stable and no major infrastructure is introduced.
notable_changes: Woodland expands over former fields in the north-east and central corridor.
Patchy western farmland merges into larger, more uniform cropland blocks.
Small clusters of new houses appear near the south-central crossroads.

No industrial, commercial or airport footprints are detected throughout the period.
